Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Requires subsidiaries of certain transportation authorities and their employees to submit all unresolvable contract negotiations to binding arbitration
Summary: Requires subsidiaries of certain authorities and their employees to submit all unresolvable contract negotiations to binding arbitration.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to resolution of disputes in the course of collective negotiations
